description:
It's a pretty big update 🤔
⇒ Become a channel member for special emojis, early videos, and more! Check it out here: https://www.youtube.com/ThioJoe/join

Links:
•  "Compress To" Registry Tweak: https://gist.github.com/ThioJoe/f4b0799e2f0d95466f4c2bd4e46d1e67
•  Sample HDR Images: https://aka.ms/hdr-backgrounds-wip

▼ Time Stamps: ▼
0:00 - Intro
0:30 - Context Menu Labels
0:39 - New Archive Formats Support
1:30 - Compress Options For Old Context Menu
2:17 - File Explorer Updates
2:51 - Energy Saver Mode
3:08 - ARM Improvements
3:35 - Shameless Plug
3:52 - Sudo for Windows
4:32 - HDR Wallpaper Support
5:13 - Improved Update Technology
6:07 - Wi-Fi 7 Support
6:16 - Scrollable Quick Settings
06:35 - Bitlocker Enabled for Fresh Installs
06:45 - New Installation Interface
07:04 - Voice Clarity
07:27 - Removed Apps
08:01 - Various Small Changes
08:09 - Parts of Kernel in Rust
08:21 - SHA-3 Support
08:27 - Emoji 15.1
08:35 - Digital Signatures Tab
08:58 - Registry Editor Search Subtree

▬▬▬▬▬
title: Windows 11 Major Annual Update 2024 - Biggest Changes (24H2)
